tool.name: Master My Data
tool.description: Comprehensive Master Data Management (MDM) tool. Identify keys, enforce contracts, map semantics, trace lineage, build golden records, resolve survivorship, and manage stewardship tasks to ensure a single source of truth.

key-identifier.name: Key Identifier
key-identifier.description: Analyzes the structural properties of a dataset and proposes candidate primary keys, foreign keys, and entity keys based on statistical inference and heuristics. Essential for uniquely identifying records before deduplication and entity resolution.

pk_uniqueness_threshold.description: Percentage of unique values required to consider a column a primary key candidate

pk_null_threshold.description: Maximum percentage of null values allowed for primary key candidates

entity_key_uniqueness_min.description: Minimum uniqueness percentage for entity key candidates

entity_key_uniqueness_max.description: Maximum uniqueness percentage for entity key candidates (above this becomes PK candidate)

fk_overlap_threshold.description: Percentage of overlap required to identify a column as foreign key

reference_tables.description: Dictionary of reference tables for FK detection (table_name -> {column: [values]})

analyze_composite_keys.description: Whether to analyze composite key combinations when no single PK found

max_composite_key_columns.description: Maximum number of columns to consider for a composite key

uniqueness_weight.description: Weight for uniqueness score in key scoring

null_density_weight.description: Weight for null density score in key scoring

pattern_weight.description: Weight for pattern detection score in key scoring

excellent_threshold.description: Score threshold for excellent quality status

good_threshold.description: Score threshold for good quality status

contract-enforcer.name: Contract Enforcer
contract-enforcer.description: Enforces predefined data contracts to ensure data is strictly compliant with external system requirements. Acts as a quality control gateway validating structural (schema) and value (content) constraints. Supports auto-transformation for compliance.

contract.description: Contract definition containing required_columns, optional_columns, column_types, column_mappings, value_constraints, uniqueness_constraints

auto_transform.description: Automatically apply transformations to achieve compliance

strict_mode.description: Fail immediately on first critical violation (stops workflow)

drop_extra_columns.description: Drop columns not specified in contract

rename_columns.description: Apply column name mappings from contract

cast_types.description: Attempt to cast columns to required types

enforce_values.description: Enforce value constraints (allowed values, ranges, patterns)

default_value_strategy.description: Strategy for handling invalid values: null, default, or drop

structural_compliance_weight.description: Weight for structural compliance in overall score

value_compliance_weight.description: Weight for value compliance in overall score

transformation_success_weight.description: Weight for transformation success in overall score

good_threshold.description: Score threshold for partially compliant status

semantic-mapper.name: Semantic Mapper
semantic-mapper.description: Maps input column names, keywords, and values to a standardized semantic schema. Ensures data from different sources with inconsistent column names or terminology is unified into one consistent structure.

custom_value_mappings.description: Custom value mappings by column (column -> {raw_value -> standard_value})

confidence_threshold.description: Minimum confidence score for automatic mapping

apply_mappings.description: Apply mappings to transform the data

name_similarity_weight.description: Weight for name similarity in scoring

pattern_match_weight.description: Weight for pattern matching in scoring

value_analysis_weight.description: Weight for value analysis in scoring

excellent_threshold.description: Score threshold for excellent quality status

good_threshold.description: Score threshold for good quality status

survivorship-resolver.name: Survivorship Resolver
survivorship-resolver.description: Determines which field values should 'survive' when multiple sources provide different or conflicting values. Applies business rules, scoring logic, and priority models to pick the best possible value before the GoldenRecordBuilder constructs the final Golden Record.

match_key_columns.description: Columns to use for identifying related records

survivorship_rules.description: Column -> rule mapping (freshness, quality_score, completeness, source_priority, frequency, richness, validation, min, max, first, last)

default_rule.description: Default rule when no specific rule is defined

min_confidence_threshold.description: Minimum confidence for considering a resolution successful

excellent_threshold.description: Score threshold for excellent quality status

good_threshold.description: Score threshold for good quality status

golden-record-builder.name: Golden Record Builder
golden-record-builder.description: Creates the final unified, conflict-resolved, highest-quality version of a record (Golden Record). Merges records from multiple sources using survivorship rules to create a single source of truth.

match_key_columns.description: Columns to use for identifying related records

survivorship_rules.description: Column -> rule mapping (most_complete, most_recent, source_priority, most_frequent, min, max, first, last)

source_priority.description: Source -> priority mapping for source_priority rule

default_survivorship_rule.description: Default rule when no specific rule is defined

min_trust_score.description: Minimum trust score threshold for flagging records

excellent_threshold.description: Score threshold for excellent quality status

good_threshold.description: Score threshold for good quality status

stewardship-flagger.name: Stewardship Flagger
stewardship-flagger.description: Identifies data issues that require human review or intervention. Automatically flags suspicious, incomplete, inconsistent, or low-confidence data so Data Stewards can take action. Acts as the quality gatekeeper of the entire data pipeline.

required_columns.description: List of columns that must have values

confidence_columns.description: Columns containing confidence scores to evaluate

outlier_thresholds.description: Field-specific outlier thresholds (field_type or column -> {min, max})

duplicate_key_columns.description: Columns to use for duplicate detection

business_rules.description: Custom business rules [{name, condition: {column, operator, value}, severity, action}]

severity_weights.description: Weights for severity levels in scoring

excellent_threshold.description: Score threshold for excellent quality status

good_threshold.description: Score threshold for good quality status

lineage-tracer.name: Lineage Tracer
lineage-tracer.description: Records each agent's execution step-by-step, creating a complete audit trail. Tracks data transformations, source systems, and dependencies for compliance and governance requirements.

previous_lineage.description: Lineage from prior agents in the pipeline

source_system.description: Name of the source system for this data

source_metadata.description: Additional metadata about the data source

track_column_lineage.description: Track lineage at the column level

max_fingerprint_rows.description: Maximum number of rows to fingerprint

execution_context.description: Additional context about the current execution

excellent_threshold.description: Score threshold for excellent quality status

good_threshold.description: Score threshold for good quality status

master-writeback-agent.name: Master Writeback Agent
master-writeback-agent.description: Creates the final output file after applying all agents' results. Consolidates transformations, resolutions, and quality improvements into a single authoritative mastered dataset with versioning and audit metadata.

version_suffix.description: Custom version suffix for output file

drop_internal_columns.description: Remove internal columns (starting with __) from clean output

min_quality_score.description: Minimum quality score for records to include

exclude_flagged_records.description: Exclude records flagged for stewardship review

flagged_record_ids.description: List of record IDs to exclude

pipeline_results.description: Results from previous agents in the pipeline

excellent_threshold.description: Score threshold for excellent quality status

good_threshold.description: Score threshold for good quality status

common_arrays.alerts: array - Critical alerts regarding master data integrity
common_arrays.recommendations: array - Suggestions for improving data mastery

report.agent_results: object - Individual agent results keyed by agent_id
report.downloads: array - Available downloadable reports (Excel, JSON, Mastered Data)

visualizations.description: Graph-ready visualizations that can be used directly by frontend charting libraries without transformation
visualizations.structure: Each visualization is a GraphReadyData object with chart_type, title, data, options, and insights

visualizations.title: Key Uniqueness Distribution
visualizations.description: Distribution of uniqueness percentages across columns

visualizations.title: Key Types Identified
visualizations.description: Breakdown of Primary, Composite, Entity, and Foreign key candidates

visualizations.title: Key Candidate Confidence Scores
visualizations.description: Confidence scores for top key candidates

visualizations.title: Contract Compliance Score
visualizations.description: Overall compliance score against the data contract

visualizations.title: Violation Types
visualizations.description: Count of violations by type (Type Mismatch, Missing Column, Value Violation, etc.)

visualizations.title: Violations by Severity
visualizations.description: Distribution of violations by severity level

visualizations.title: Auto-Transformations Applied
visualizations.description: Count of transformations by type (rename, cast, drop, replace)

visualizations.title: Column Mapping Coverage
visualizations.description: Distribution of mapped vs unmapped columns

visualizations.title: Mapping Confidence Distribution
visualizations.description: Distribution of confidence scores across column mappings

visualizations.title: Value Standardizations by Column
visualizations.description: Count of value standardizations applied per column

visualizations.title: Pipeline Lineage Depth
visualizations.description: Number of processing steps in the data lineage

visualizations.title: Transformation Types Detected
visualizations.description: Count of transformations by type (column_added, column_removed, type_changed, etc.)

visualizations.title: Data Source Distribution
visualizations.description: Distribution of data across source systems

visualizations.title: Record Compression Ratio
visualizations.description: Ratio of input records to golden records created

visualizations.title: Trust Score Distribution
visualizations.description: Distribution of trust scores across golden records

visualizations.title: Conflicts Resolved by Column
visualizations.description: Count of conflicts resolved per column

visualizations.title: Survivorship Rules Applied
visualizations.description: Distribution of survivorship rules used for conflict resolution

visualizations.title: Conflict Resolution Rate
visualizations.description: Percentage of conflicts successfully resolved

visualizations.title: Rules Applied Distribution
visualizations.description: Distribution of survivorship rules used

visualizations.title: Resolution Confidence by Field
visualizations.description: Average confidence score per field

visualizations.title: Unresolved Conflicts by Field
visualizations.description: Count of unresolved conflicts per field

visualizations.title: Write Success Rate
visualizations.description: Percentage of records successfully written

visualizations.title: Data Integrity Score
visualizations.description: Overall data integrity score

visualizations.title: Record Exclusion Breakdown
visualizations.description: Distribution of excluded records by reason

visualizations.title: Issue Types Distribution
visualizations.description: Distribution of issues by type (MISSING_REQUIRED, INVALID_FORMAT, etc.)

visualizations.title: Issues by Severity
visualizations.description: Count of issues by severity level

visualizations.title: Issues by Column
visualizations.description: Count of issues per column

visualizations.title: Clean Data Rate
visualizations.description: Percentage of data without quality issues

frontend_usage.note: Each visualization in report.visualizations is immediately ready for charting libraries

structure.chart_type: bar_chart | pie_chart | line_chart | gauge | heatmap | radar_chart | bubble_chart | histogram | progress_ring | status_grid | stacked_bar_chart | line_overlay
structure.title: Display title for the visualization
structure.insights: Array of key takeaways or findings
